title: The Brass Bed
description: THE Satisfy one hundred women or be trapped in a brass bed foreverLord Randall was a lousy lover in 1811, so his magician-mistress turned him into a sex demon. Lucky for him, his bed fell into Clay's hands.THE Sex therapy for women on an antique brass "treatment bed"Clay has the perfect scam going, until that pesky, foxy fraud investigator Jewel comes sniffing around. Lucky for him, she has a soft spot for hunky con men.THE Sex demon or sex fraudster?Jewel is Randy's hundredth woman. Now he says he's her personal sex slave, and her case against the con artist is dissolving in a hail of hormones. Lucky for her, she's a tough cop with a lusty libido.
author: Jennifer Stevenson
